original_title: The Secret Dreams of Mona Q
overview: Mona Q - on the surface, a calm and proper young wife, deep inside she's a hot young temptress, driven by uncontrollable urges! This beautifully photographed film takes us on a journey into the erotic fantasy world of a young couple, as they flex their sexual muscles with an endless variety of partners! Male or Female, Black or White, Mona wants them all!
tagline: Marriage without fantasy is like life without wine.
title: The Secret Dreams of Mona Q
